info.name: OpenGameArt visual update
info.description: I love this site but grew tired of the the odd design. If the owner ever finds this still feel free to use the code but please contact me so I can see it live.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.18.05.0 - January 29th, 2018: Initial design.
Version 1.18.05.1 - January 31th, 2018: Fix Google font https error, added support for more user pages.
